abstract.text: User name of the new user.
Email address of the new user.
Application which is main API component for Vernissage photos sharing platform.
Information if user accepted the server rules. Only request with
as a value can be procesed.
An entity that stores credential token data.
etc. This will be used to prepare email for confirmation email message.
When registartion by moderator approval is enabled (and open registration is disabled) user have to write reason why account for him should be created.
Password for the new account. At least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, number or symbol.
When registration by invitation is enabled (and open registration is disabled) the invitation token have to be specified.
Base url to web application. Its used to redirect from email about email confirmation to correct web application page.
